pullRequest.title: Upgrade to lucene 8.5.1 release
pullRequest.bodyText: Upgrade to lucene 8.5.1 release that contains a bug fix for a bug that might introduce index corruption when deleting data from an index that was previously shrunk.

nodes.bodyText: I think you'll need to do these bits after backporting to avoid test failures.

commit.message: set 8.5.0 from active release, do them afterwards.
